name: Dongsuk Jeon
content: People | Mobile Multimedia Systems Group Dongsuk Jeon, Professor Education 2003 – 2009, B.S. in electrical engineering, Seoul National University 2009 – 2014, Ph.D. in electrical engineering, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor (Advisor: Prof. Dennis Sylvester) Professional experience 2012, Research Intern, Texas Instruments 2013, Research Intern, IMEC, Belgium 2013 – 2014, Visiting Scholar, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore 2014 – 2015, Postdoctoral Associate, MIT (Advisor: Prof. Anantha Chandrakasan) 2016 – Present, Professor, Seoul National University Research interests Digital signal processing, low power integrated circuits, System-on-Chip (SoC) architecture PhD/MS Students Changyu Seong Research area Machine learning processor dyedds0424@snu.ac.kr Sangsu Jeong
